summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of The Alley between Blocks 29 and 30, Carleton Park Addition, and in Block 5, Briarcliff Addition No. 2, being the alley in the block bounded by 42nd Avenue West, West Viewmont Way, and West Armour Street, and certain other alleys and streets, by paving, constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 5903, and appropriating money from the Water Fund in aid thereof.
